page.title: 03A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ...
page.content: My name is Tim Mackenzie and I live in Tarrant launceston and this is how I usually spend my Saturdays.I get up about 9 o'clock being careful not to wake my brother up who sleeps in the same bedroom.I dont have much for breakfast,usually a cup of coffee and then I go 'rookie hunting'.A rookie is a bird scarer,a bit like a firework and they are often lying about the fields I collect as many as I can find and then go home for an early lunch I have to change two ponies haynets.We have lots of animals,ducks,hens,goats and dogs.After tea I watch television or I go out in the garden for a game of frisby throwing with my brother.I usually go to bed at 10pm.
